biotools.summary: Performs rapid analysis of transport processes in proteins. It models the transportation of a ligand from outside environment into the protein active or binding site and vice versa. It implements a novel algorithm to produce contiguous ligand trajectory and estimation of a binding energy along the pathway. The current version uses CAVER for pathway identification and heavily modified Autodock Vina as a docking engine.
